item.title: Europe markets close higher as oil and gas stocks advance; Sterling, euro slip on strong dollar
item.description: European markets closed higher Thursday following a mixed start to 2025 trading.

item.title: U.S. dollar index hits more than two-year high as markets brace for Trump return
item.description: Optimism around the U.S. economy was in focus as markets reopened following disrupted trade over Christmas and the New Year.

item.title: Tesla shares slide after it reports first drop in annual deliveries
item.description: Tesla's fourth-quarter deliveries report follows a huge late-year rally in the stock that lifted its gain for 2024 to 63%.

item.title: Ukraine just stopped Russian gas flows to Europe. Here's who's most at risk
item.description: Austria has insisted it is well prepared for the stoppage, but Slovakia has threatened to cut electricity supplies to neighboring Ukraine.

item.title: These restaurant chains closed locations in 2024
item.description: Wendy's, Applebee's and Red Lobster were among the chains that announced restaurant closures in 2024.
